properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 1 at 2:14PM MST until February 4 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches
possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph mainly along and
north of Highway 40 Monday afternoon through Tuesday morning.

* WHERE...Central Yampa River Basin.

* WHEN...From Monday morning through Tuesday morning.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times with patchy
blowing snow significantly reducing visibility, especially in
open areas. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at:
www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING
